SELECT NON EMPTY { [Measures].[Fact2 Count] } ON COLUMNS, NON EMPTY { ([Dim Product].[Category Name].[Category Name].ALLMEMBERS * [Dim Product].[Product ID].[Product ID].ALLMEMBERS * [Dim Product].[Name].[Name].ALLMEMBERS * [Dim Product].[Sub Category Name].[Sub Category Name].ALLMEMBERS * [Dim Vendor].[Account Number].[Account Number].ALLMEMBERS * [Dim Vendor].[Address Line1].[Address Line1].ALLMEMBERS * [Dim Vendor].[City].[City].ALLMEMBERS * [Dim Vendor].[Contact Name].[Contact Name].ALLMEMBERS * [Dim Vendor].[Contact Type].[Contact Type].ALLMEMBERS * [Dim Vendor].[Country Region Name].[Country Region Name].ALLMEMBERS * [Dim Vendor].[Email Address].[Email Address].ALLMEMBERS * [Dim Vendor].[Phone Number].[Phone Number].ALLMEMBERS * [Dim Vendor].[Vendor Name].[Vendor Name].ALLMEMBERS * [Dim Vendor].[State Province Name].[State Province Name].ALLMEMBERS ) } DIMENSION PROPERTIES MEMBER_CAPTION, MEMBER_UNIQUE_NAME ON ROWS FROM [Project] CELL PROPERTIES VALUE, BACK_COLOR, FORE_COLOR, FORMATTED_VALUE, FORMAT_STRING, FONT_NAME, FONT_SIZE, FONT_FLAGS
